availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert B. Jameson (Owsley County merchant and soldier, served in 8th Ky Infantry USA)

body.p: Beattyville, Owsley County Kentucky merchant and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Gilly Ann Jameson. Father of George Ella Jameson, Wlaker Jameson and Bronlow Jameson. Served as Captain in 8th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A) from January 15th, 1862 until he resigned on March 17th, 1863.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Owsley County, Beatyville, p. 376
Compiled Service Records of Volunteer Union Soldiers who Served in Organizations From State of KentuckyRobert B. Jameson, NARA RG 94, Microfilm Series M397, Roll 223.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lee County, Proctor, p. 335B
